questions_and_notes: Won't this root name likely be confused with "relative humidity"?   Replace "rh" with "fresph", more consistent with other similar variables.
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 3 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: time: mean where shrubs (comment: mask=shrubFrac)
long_name: Heterotrophic Respiration on Shrub Tiles as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
comment: Total RH of shrubs in the grid cell
